English: Allow new games to include DLC
New Game Options always allows you to include DLC in base game.
Remove Rabbit from Humble Beginning when both DLC are active
Rabbits make a lot of Poop, which makes villagers sick.#Killing a Rabbit creates 2 sadness.#Playing both DLC can be impossible if you get a rabbit.
Requests for 2 or more items will be reduced or increased by one item, if not set to normal.
Sadness generated by villager actions is 20% faster or slower, if not set to normal.
Duration of young villagers is 1, 2, or 3 days.#Duration of old villagers is 1, 2, or 3 days.
When enabled, Old villagers cannot use houses to create new villages. They're too old.
